tests.query:
-- Tags: distributed

SELECT 'distributed_group_by_no_merge=1';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT count(), uniq(dummy) FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', system.one) SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=1;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT count(), uniq(dummy) FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3,4,5}', system.one) SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=1;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT count(), uniq(dummy) FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', system.one) LIMIT 1 SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=1;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'distributed_group_by_no_merge=2';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SET max_distributed_connections=1;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SET max_threads=1;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'LIMIT';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT any(_shard_num) shard_num, count(), uniq(dummy) FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', system.one)) ORDER BY shard_num LIMIT 1 SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'OFFSET';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT any(_shard_num) shard_num, count(), uniq(dummy) FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', system.one)) ORDER BY shard_num LIMIT 1, 1 SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'ALIAS';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT dummy AS d FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', system.one) ORDER BY d SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS data_00184;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE data_00184 Engine=Memory() AS SELECT * FROM numbers(2);
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'ORDER BY';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT number FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', currentDatabase(), data_00184) ORDER BY number DESC SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'ORDER BY LIMIT';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT number FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', currentDatabase(), data_00184) ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 1 SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'LIMIT BY';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT number FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', currentDatabase(), data_00184) LIMIT 1 BY number SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'LIMIT BY LIMIT';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT number FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', currentDatabase(), data_00184) LIMIT 1 BY number LIMIT 1 SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'GROUP BY ORDER BY';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT uniq(number) u FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', currentDatabase(), data_00184) GROUP BY number ORDER BY u DESC SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query:
-- cover possible tricky issues
SELECT 'GROUP BY w/ ALIAS';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT n FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', currentDatabase(), data_00184) GROUP BY number AS n ORDER BY n SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'ORDER BY w/ ALIAS';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT n FROM remote('127.0.0.{2,3}', currentDatabase(), data_00184) ORDER BY number AS n LIMIT 1 SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT 'func(aggregate function) GROUP BY';
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: SELECT assumeNotNull(argMax(dummy, 1)) FROM remote('127.1', system.one) SETTINGS distributed_group_by_no_merge=2;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql

tests.query: drop table data_00184;
tests.name: 00184_shard_distributed_group_by_no_merge.sql
